One of my favourite (living) #scifi authors getting #vaccinated so he and everyone else can KEEP on living in this age of #COVID19.💉✅

Help make the #coronavirus a bad memory, not an ongoing #pandemic: #WearAmask and make a #vaccine appointment ASAP at https://t.co/NwHxDZUVzu✔️ https://t.co/vix9g4l0yP
